# Sahira specific code

# HeudiConv_BIDS_conversion
Repository having codes written using heudiconv for conversion of dicoms to BIDS 

# Update Python for using heudiconv and git on the cluster

```bash
source /usr/local/apps/psycapps/config/conda_bash_update heudiconv
```

# Open another new terminal and run the following command templates:

# Generate Heuristics

```bash
bash /usr/local/apps/psycapps/HeudiConv_BIDS_conversion/code/call_heudiconv.sh /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/raw_data/ /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/BIDS_test '202002031025_19750928MRSH,202002181407_20000626SHCL,202002201506_20010607ASSI,202002251059_20000510IARE,202002251505_19980516SEBR,202002271359_19990729ATKA,202002271458_20010715UZPN,202003031201_20000607JARS,202003031305_20000126XXXX,202003031353_20010218NZJM,202003031515_19980212PNBA,202003101114_20000322AASS,202003101218_19990823JNSE,202003101502_20000516ANTE,202003121511_19950507NVCO,202010151324_20001104SRWL,202010151421_19971101DBSI,202010201250_20010830BEAA,202010270950_20010110RSMC,202010271324_19960323MCHI,202010271422_19990105SABT,202010290954_20020525LURW,202010291125_20010421TRMR,202010291331_19980427BAPA,202010291438_20001013SACU,202011031133_20000218FTBR,202011031253_19970705MGVL,202011031338_20010118GNLC,202011031414_20020216ILGE,202011051513_20020614MRRD,202011121013_19990318IGBR,202011121122_19971202EAKN,202011171213_20011119DRSA,202011171348_20011201SELR,202011171445_19980110EAKN' /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/BIDS_test/anon_id.py
```

# Generate the dataset 

```bash
bash /usr/local/apps/psycapps/HeudiConv_BIDS_conversion/code/call_heudiconv.sh /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/raw_data/ /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/BIDS_test '202002031025_19750928MRSH,202002181407_20000626SHCL,202002201506_20010607ASSI,202002251059_20000510IARE,202002251505_19980516SEBR,202002271359_19990729ATKA,202002271458_20010715UZPN,202003031201_20000607JARS,202003031305_20000126XXXX,202003031353_20010218NZJM,202003031515_19980212PNBA,202003101114_20000322AASS,202003101218_19990823JNSE,202003101502_20000516ANTE,202003121511_19950507NVCO,202010151324_20001104SRWL,202010151421_19971101DBSI,202010201250_20010830BEAA,202010270950_20010110RSMC,202010271324_19960323MCHI,202010271422_19990105SABT,202010290954_20020525LURW,202010291125_20010421TRMR,202010291331_19980427BAPA,202010291438_20001013SACU,202011031133_20000218FTBR,202011031253_19970705MGVL,202011031338_20010118GNLC,202011031414_20020216ILGE,202011051513_20020614MRRD,202011121013_19990318IGBR,202011121122_19971202EAKN,202011171213_20011119DRSA,202011171348_20011201SELR,202011171445_19980110EAKN' /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/BIDS_test/anon_id.py /MRIWork/MRIWork03/nf/sahira_vandewouw/BIDS_test/heuristic_template.py
```
